changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql:
CREATE TABLE track ( driftnum bigint NOT NULL, file_id bigint NOT NULL, geom geometry(Geometry,4326), time_coverage_start timestamp with time zone, time_coverage_end timestamp with time zone, CONSTRAINT track_pk PRIMARY KEY (driftnum), CONSTRAINT track_file_fk FOREIGN KEY (file_id) REFERENCES indexed_file (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT track_geom_check CHECK (st_isvalid(geom)) );
CREATE INDEX track_gist_idx ON track USING GIST (geom);

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql:
CREATE TABLE measurement ( driftnum bigint NOT NULL, file_id bigint NOT NULL, index bigint NOT NULL, date timestamp with time zone NOT NULL, latitude double precision, longitude double precision, geom geometry(Geometry,4326), CONSTRAINT measurement_pk PRIMARY KEY (driftnum, index), CONSTRAINT measurement_file_fk FOREIGN KEY (file_id) REFERENCES indexed_file (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE -- CONSTRAINT measurement_track_fk FOREIGN KEY (driftnum) -- REFERENCES track (driftnum) MATCH SIMPLE -- ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE ); COMMENT ON COLUMN measurement.index IS 'index of measurement in netCDF file';
CREATE INDEX measurement_gist_idx ON measurement USING GIST (geom);

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: DROP VIEW IF EXISTS noaa_drifters_map; CREATE VIEW noaa_drifters_map AS SELECT t.driftnum, t.file_id, t.time_coverage_start AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AS time_coverage_start, t.time_coverage_end AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AS time_coverage_end, t.geom, f.url, f.size FROM track t JOIN indexed_file f ON t.file_id = f.id;

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: DROP VIEW IF EXISTS noaa_drifters_data; CREATE VIEW noaa_drifters_data AS SELECT driftnum, file_id, index, date AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AS date, latitude, longitude, geom FROM measurement;
